section.title: Opening a Console for a Virtual Machine
section.para: Open a web-based VNC or SPICE console for a virtual machine.

procedure.title: To Open a Console for a Virtual Machine

step.para: Click on the virtual machine that you want to access.

Click
(Open a web-based VNC or SPICE console for this VM).

section.para: The virtual machine console opens in a new tab in your browser.
